answers.content_html: The force is proportional to the product of two charges.
The force is inversely proportional to the product of two charges.
answers.feedback_html: Recall Coulomb’s law of electrostatics, which states that force is directly proportional to the product of two charges.

answers.content_html: The force is proportional to any one of the charges between which the force is acting.
answers.feedback_html: Recall Coulomb’s law of electrostatics, which states that force is directly proportional to the product of two charges.

answers.content_html: The force is inversely proportional to any one of the charges between which the force is acting.

stem_html: How are electrostatic force and charge related?
